I

ICD10CodesManipulator - Class in it.trvi.simpleicd10
An object that contains the whole ICD-10 classification and that can thus provide information about the whole classification or about single codes.
ICD10CodesManipulator() - Constructor for class it.trvi.simpleicd10.ICD10CodesManipulator
The constructor that reads the data from the xml file to load all the data relative to the ICD-10 classification.
isAncestor(String, String) - Method in class it.trvi.simpleicd10.ICD10CodesManipulator
It checks whether a code (a) is one of the ancestors of another code (b).
isBlock(String) - Method in class it.trvi.simpleicd10.ICD10CodesManipulator
It checks whether a String is a valid block in ICD-10.
isCategory(String) - Method in class it.trvi.simpleicd10.ICD10CodesManipulator
It checks whether a String is a valid category in ICD-10.
isCategoryOrSubcategory(String) - Method in class it.trvi.simpleicd10.ICD10CodesManipulator
It checks whether a String is a valid category or subcategory in ICD-10.
isChapter(String) - Method in class it.trvi.simpleicd10.ICD10CodesManipulator
It checks whether a String is a valid chapter in ICD-10.
isChapterOrBlock(String) - Method in class it.trvi.simpleicd10.ICD10CodesManipulator
It checks whether a String is a valid chapter or block in ICD-10.
isDescendant(String, String) - Method in class it.trvi.simpleicd10.ICD10CodesManipulator
It checks whether a code (a) is one of the descendants of another code (b).
isLeaf(String) - Method in class it.trvi.simpleicd10.ICD10CodesManipulator
Given a String that contains an ICD-10 code, it checks whether that code is a leaf in the ICD-10 classification.
isSubcategory(String) - Method in class it.trvi.simpleicd10.ICD10CodesManipulator
It checks whether a String is a valid subcategory in ICD-10.
isValidItem(String) - Method in class it.trvi.simpleicd10.ICD10CodesManipulator
It checks whether a String is a valid chapter, block, category or subcategory in ICD-10.
